segments.text: Now , Mr.William , a little personal information first , are you married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am . Actually my wife is a teacher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been study in German ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since I first met my wife , about three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And just one more question , would you like to be an interpreter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I â€™ d like to do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , you can come here to work next month .
segments.speaker: S1
